If you are not using catkin workspaces and want to perform a from source system installation, could you try if the following commands work for you?

```
mkdir build
cd build
cmake .. -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/ros/$ROS_DISTRO -DCATKIN_BUILD_BINARY_PACKAGE=1
make
sudo make install
```
Warning: packages will be installed on /opt/ros/$ROS_DISTRO, change destination in cmake if you don't want them to be installed in that path.
